Protein

Pasta Dishes

For those fancying a hearty taste of ancient Italy while staying with us, all of our pasta dishes are available with generous toppings of grated mozzarella or shavings of PDO parmigiano reggiano.

3.50cr

3.25cr

4.00cr

Beef Grill Dishes

Cooked to your liking, whether that's rare, medium-rare, medium, medium-well, or well-done. Served with two grilled tomatoes, a large grilled mushroom, and your choice of either thick-cut fries, mashed potato or a baked potato. Looking for an extra protein kick? Then add a fried egg or two to round out your meal.
